channel.title: Compiling! 'Main' Class error
channel.description:
Hello! i got the pk planet V2 and i need compile it so.. i have this on my compiler:
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Archivos de programa\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
That is the correct route, yes i have JDK6 update 20
But when i open it it says me this:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Presione una tecla para continuar . . .[/code]
Any can help me?!!
PD: pk planet is a soruce of 317, i have windows XP also my pc is in spanish for that some words are in spanish

item.title: Compiling! 'Main' Class error
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

Hello! i got the pk planet V2 and i need compile it soâ€¦ i have this on my compiler:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Archivos de programa\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

That is the correct route, yes i have JDK6 update 20

But when i open it it says me this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Presione una tecla para continuar . . .

Any can help me?!!

PD: pk planet is a soruce of 317, i have windows XP also my pc is in spanish for that some words are in spanish
